Germany: Louis the Blind was crowned Holy Roman Emperor by the pope Pope Benedict IV.
Japan: Nihon Sandai Jitsuroku (6th and last of historical chronicles Rikkokushi) was completed.
Spain: Day of Zamora: The Asturian defenders of Zamora, Spain dealt heavy casualties to a Cordoban force attempting to conquer it. The heads of the besiegers were displayed on the city walls.
